policies.title: Standard Fair Usage Policy
rules: After allocated data is exhausted, speed will reduce to 128 kbps.
Network management may apply during peak hours.

policies.title: Social Media Fair Usage
rules: Unlimited access limited to WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram.
Video calls are not included.
High usage may reduce speed after 20GB threshold.

policies.title: Video Streaming Fair Usage
rules: Video resolution may be limited to 720p.
Speed reduction after 50GB consumption.

policies.title: SIM Ownership Policy
rules: SIM must be registered under valid NIC.
Ownership change requires physical presence of current and new owner.
Biometric verification required.

policies.title: SIM Replacement Rules
rules: Customer must present original NIC.
Replacement fee applies.
Max 3 replacements per year.

policies.title: Package Refund Policy
rules: Refunds are not available once package is activated.
Technical failure cases are reviewed manually.
Refund processing time: 5 working days.

policies.title: International Roaming Policy
rules: Roaming must be activated before travel.
Usage beyond bundle will be charged at standard roaming rates.
Coverage depends on partner operator.

policies.title: Account Suspension Policy
rules: Postpaid accounts suspended after 45 days of unpaid bill.
Prepaid SIM deactivated after 180 days of inactivity.
Reactivation fee may apply.

policies.title: Number Portability Policy
rules: Customer must clear outstanding dues.
Porting process takes 2â€“3 working days.
Temporary service interruption may occur.
